name: Tower of Eglathia
description: Tower of Eglathia is a modern-day rogue-like fantasy adventure based on a tower in the book, Eglathia, (on Amazon). As a single adventurer, choose your biography and reason for entering the tower. Then enter the tower and face a host of different monsters while building up your character with three unique skill trees: Barbarian, Mystic,...
minimum_requirements: OS: 7.0 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Duo Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Additional Notes: .NET 4.5.1 required
recommended_requirements: OS: 8.1 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Duo Core Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Additional Notes: .NET 4.5.1 required
